Field Metadata
info.content:
Field used for choropleth map: metroariac
| title |description | | --- | --- | | sa1no | Unique code assigned by the ABS for each 2011 ASGS Statistical Area Level 1 code | | metroariac | Metro ARIA - General purpose composite metropolitan accessibility index class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | metroarian | Metro ARIA - General purpose metropolitan accessibility index class name/description | | ma_edu | Metro ARIA Education service theme class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | ma_edu_n | Metro ARIA Education service theme class name/description | | ma_fpost | Metro ARIA Financial/Postal service theme class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | ma_fpost_n | Metro ARIA Financial/Postal service theme classification name/description | | ma_hlth | Metro ARIA Health service theme class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | ma_hlth_n | Metro ARIA Health service theme class name/description | | ma_ptrans | MetroARIA Public Transport service theme class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | ma_ptransn | Metro ARIA Public Transport service theme class name/description | | ma_shop | MetrARIA Shopping service theme class code: ranging from 1 (very high metropolitan accessibility) to 5 (limited metropolitan accessibility) | | ma_shop_n | Metro ARIA Shopping service theme class name/description | | ucl_code | Capital city urban boundary based on the 2011 ABS Urban Centre/Locality ASGS structure code | | ucl_name | Capital city urban boundary based on the 2011 ABS Urban Centre/Locality ASGS structure |
